Articles.Content:
One day I was building a normal ship wen suddenly i couldn't place anything. I zoomed out and the part i was trying to place was attached to nothing but air. after that I could only press the exit button, no save, no launch, no nothing but exit. Is there a way to fix it not?

![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

What you describe is not expected behaviour, therefore is a bug.

You should open a thread within the "Development & Support" section (either modded or unmoddded install) and also provide any other useful info, compliant to the instructions for either [unmodded](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230) or [modded](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229). 

Also, check other threads over there, others may already have reported the same (in that case, you may better add to the same thread, if still open).
